name: Big Shot
description:
Sorry, I overloaded this game with different mechanics and levels.

Big Shot, an action packed 2D Shooter. Shoot enemies, complete levels and do epic stuff. This game is a demo!

Instructions are in game 

link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/813371995/

Not convinced? Well look at what our amazing customers have to say about this game!

Jimmy: "Lol game is super epic and I love it amazing boss battle and the game is bigger than your mom, this game 20/10"

Bob: "Cool game, I had a great time playing this game! Cool guns pew pew, this game is 11/10" (:

New levels and story coming soon! (;

Version 1.0.6
